mapper.select: SELECT apr_no ,doc_no ,apr_sq ,apr_line ,apr_emp ,apr_name ,apr_yn ,get_codename(apr_yn) as apr_code ,apr_dt ,re_cmt FROM apr WHERE doc_no = #{dno} ORDER BY apr_sq
SELECT d.dept_name ,e.emp_name ,dc.emp_id FROM doc_rece dc JOIN emp e ON(dc.emp_id = e.emp_id) JOIN dept d ON(e.dept_id = d.dept_id) WHERE dc.doc_no = #{dno} ORDER BY d.dept_id, e.job_no
